title: Best bans for low elo V2

replies.body: Pretty good summary especially point #2. If your team top mid and jg haven't hovered anything, ban those two quick. Prevents feeding. You forgot two other champions that wreck low elo: {{champion:107}}  and {{champion:63}} . It's a great thing that we can't just ban everyone!

> [{quoted}](name=Cakemeisting,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vxKjnJPJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-16T03:01:51.346+0000)
>
> Pretty good summary especially point #2. If your team top mid and jg haven't hovered anything, ban those two quick. Prevents feeding. You forgot two other champions that wreck low elo: {{champion:107}}  and {{champion:63}} . It's a great thing that we can't just ban everyone!

Yea forgot to add rengar to the list. dunno about brand however, he has a pretty low pick rate in silver below games.
you should 100% ban {{champion:67}} and {{champion:134}} , 3rd ban for whoever you hate in lane.
